nycTheatreExcerpt: This moment, among many others, brought the house down. Oh, Mary! is an uproariously inaccurate and queer romp through history without the tiring anachronistic politics of, say, fellow historical romps Hamilton or Six, or even contemporary TV shows like Dickinson or the current sleeper summer hit My Lady Jane.
